name: databox-store-mock
description: A debug Databox store that simply forwards any requests to a specified driver

scripts.release: docker build -t databox-store-mock . && docker tag databox-store-mock amar.io:5000/databox-store-mock && docker push amar.io:5000/databox-store-mock

author: Yousef Amar <yousef@amar.io> (http://yousefamar.com/)
